text: Meaulne-Vitray is a commune. It is in the Allier department in the center of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Meaulne (the seat) and Vitray.Arrêté préfectoral 19 July 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Allier
title: Meaulne-Vitray
